name: FootPong (hamcorgames)
description:
For more info and other games, please visit hamcorgames.com

2D Top-Down Soccer Quick Match - Windows PC

Select Player Names

Select from 4 colors

Select Score Limit

Player1 Controls:                             WASD - move                &         SPACE - kick

Player2 Controls:     ARROWS - move        &       RIGHT_CTRL - kick

Change & Save SFX and MUSIC levels

Most Importantly - HAVE FUN !
